name: McQ Unattended Ground Sensor
description: Ground sensor for detecting presence and movement of entities

entitySpecs.description: Data describing an entity detected by the sensor.

propertySpecs.name: timestamp
propertySpecs.description: Date and time when the detection occurred.

propertySpecs.name: latitude
propertySpecs.description: Latitude of the detected entity's current location.

propertySpecs.name: longitude
propertySpecs.description: Longitude of the detected entity's current location.

propertySpecs.name: confidence
propertySpecs.description: Confidence level of the detection (e.g., a value between 0 and 1).
